name: BuyMeaPie
0:
”Alexa, ask Buy Me a Pie to add milk”
”Alexa, open Buy Me a Pie and add apples”
”Alexa, ask Buy Me a Pie to add an item to the list Walmart”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buy me a pie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We help over 6 million users around the world do their shopping routines with joy and pleasure.

Shopping management has never been that easy – just ask Alexa to add anything to your shopping list the moment you remember it!

You definitely need this skill if you know the value of:

* Time: a well-planned list updated in real time saves precious minutes and hours in a store
* Money: when you know what to buy you're safe from spontaneous purchases and a waste of money
* High spirits: we are sure you'll be happier without frustration caused by double purchases or forgotten items to buy
* Environment: paper shopping lists are made of trees. Our lists are made of lines of program code

Set up Buy Me a Pie! for Alexa in a wink:

1. Click 'Enable' to link your account in the Buy Me a Pie! app to the skill. You’ll be taken to the authorization page.
2. Log in using your Buy Me a Pie! login and PIN.
3. The skill will be ready for use.

How it works:
* Start with saying 'Alexa, open Buy Me a Pie!'
* Alexa will ask you which products you would like to add to your shopping list
* Mention one product name at a time and Alexa will add it to your newest shopping list
* Say "Stop" or "That's it" to end the session
* You can also ask Alexa to add a product to a certain shopping list – for example, say 'Alexa, ask Buy Me a Pie to add apples to the list "Alexa"'
